title: Drawing, "Partial Table Elevation", ca. 1845
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite ? on verso with the caption: Alligator
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of three cows on road leading backwards through a wood, at left, with hills visible in the rear.
Verso: Upper left part of the elevation of a table, whose leg is shaped as a baluster and the corner of the frame as bracket, and at left drawn vertically and indistinct design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Partial Table Elevation", ca. 1845.
ca. 1845. Graphite on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-21.
